  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
          **1.Use product_id numbers as:**
          SeerID: 1
          SeerIDB: 2
          SeerIQ: 3
          SeerScan: 4
          Seer360: 5
          SeerPhone: 6
          SeerIDBI: 518
          SeerWLSPM: 1030
          SeerWeb: 2054
          SeerEmail: 2055
          SeerDiligenceB: 2056
          SeerIP: 2057
          SeerDiligenceC: 2568
          SeerIDI: 2569
          **2.Use sub_product as:**
          For SeerScan: "DocOnly","DocWithLiveness","DocWithSelfie",
          For SeerWLSPM: "Lite","Standard","Extended"
          **3.We can add multiple product_id seperated by comma (,)in the steps: such as**
          "steps": [ \{ "product_id": 1, "step_number": 1 \}, \{ "product_id": 2, "step_number": 2 \} ]
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"name"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"SeerTest"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"requestType"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"add"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"active"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int32"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":1}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={true}

                </span>

                  Array [
                </div>
